issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Like other daemons, doSecureLogin() should get called in serviceInit but not serviceStart, otherwise, some FS operations could have problem during composite services get started.
fields.summary: AHS Security login should be in serviceInit() instead of serviceStart()

comments.body: Update a quick patch to fix it. Straightforward enough, so no need unit test.
